reindex

protected void reindex(java.io.File anOBmFile,
                       int aRecordSize,
                       IDIndexFile anOutputFile,
                       java.io.File aFinalOutputFile)
                throws java.io.IOException
Reindex a single .obm -file. (Only the default 1D-index. Not the 2D-index of nodes.)

Parameters:
anOBmFile - the .obm -file to scan
aRecordSize - the size of the record
anOutputFile - the temporary file to build the index in
aFinalOutputFile - the index-file after re-creation
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if anything fails
See Also:
NodesFile#getNodeRecordLength()}, WaysFile#getWayRecordLength()}, RelationsFile#getRelationRecordLength()}
